title: Clemson Might Be Great. But Their Not-So-Great Conference Presents a Problem.
text:
Clemson is the defending national champion of college football and has the sport’s longest current winning streak at 20. But a close call last weekend against unranked North Carolina has exposed what may be the Tigers’ biggest weakness: their easy schedule for the rest of 2019.

The narrow win over the Tar Heels—saved by stopping a 2-point conversion with 1:17 remaining—spared Clemson from being on the losing end of the upset of the decade. But it cost the Tigers in the polls, dropping them to No 2 behind rival Alabama in the...
description: Clemson could finish the season having played 10 straight games against unranked opponents.
